enhance_productivity: Enhance your Productivity & make your life more better
organize_yourself: Organize yourself you never experienced ever.
why_app_desc: We have only one goal to make yourself more productive & that's why we have keep InstaTodos completely Free.
how_to_organize_desc: InstaTodos provides everything to get you started to your path to success to track everything & analyse your progress in real time.
track_everything_desc: Track your progress. Add reminders to remember everything. With beautiful themes and efficient tools, you save time and achieve great goals.
login_text: Enter your email address and password to access
what_todo: What is on your mind today?
